page.title: 16Why we like Frome
page.content:
We think that the best part of Frome is the Sports Centre because you can do lots of things there. You can go swimming, play squash, judo, football, tennis, rollerboots and Badminton. You can go up stairs and watch the people swim. You can go to the Victoria Park and the adventure playground to play. At the Victoria Park you can play on your bike. From Frome we can go to Longleat. Although Frome is quite a small town, it has many interesting buildings and shops, and it has its own football ground and team. We like the old, narrow streets.
by Mark, Cindy, Leanne & Jason (aged 9) St. John's School
